[vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” el_class=”tj-pricing-for-men-section”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”30″ font_family=”none” align=”center” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]Pricing For Men[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1605257743125{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
Simple Shirt 700 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple Pant 900 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple Coat 4000 Rs Book an Appointment
Waistcoat 1200 Rs Book an Appointment
2 Piece Suit 4500 Rs Book an Appointment
3 Piece Suit 6000 Rs Book an Appointment
Tuxedo Suit 6000 Rs Book an Appointment
Pathani 1500 Rs Book an Appointment
Kurta Pajama 1400 Rs Book an Appointment
[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider size=”70″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1606812946537{background-color: #f7f4ef !important;}” el_class=”tj-pricing-for-women-section”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”30″ font_family=”none” align=”center” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]Pricing For Women[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1605262406510{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
Simple kurti without lining 550 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple kurti with lining 900 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple salwar suit without lining 700 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple salwar suit with kurti lining 850 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple salwar suit with full lining 1200 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple pant suit without lining 950 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple pant suit with half lining 1200 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple pant suit with full lining 1500 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple blouse 650 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple blouse with lining 750 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple skirt umbrella cut 1200 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple anarkali dress 2500 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple lehenga choli 3500 Rs Book an Appointment
Saree fall pico 350 Rs Book an Appointment
[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider size=”70″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
